attributes.review: The app is very laggy and My phone got flooded with notifications. I am worried because I provided my email and the quality of the app is not very great so I wouldn’t be surprised if I got hacked. Make this app a little greater please.
attributes.title: DONT GET

attributes.review: I👋🏻was a total trump supporter🇺🇸 loved everything about him❤️, but when I downloaded💾, and entered my phone📱number, it spammed calls📞 and texts✉️ about Biden👎🏻at least 35 times⏰an hour😫it was crazy🤯, now I hate💔 trump and his app⌚️
attributes.title: Trump App

attributes.review: I open the app, and I was greeted with an unpleasant greeting. The app told me that I smelt like chicken fingers and was built like a french fry. Worst customer service ever! I will not be coming back. I would also like to speak to the manager thank you.
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: I don’t like the colors, they are too bright! I don’t like the name of the app, to weird! Can’t stand the stuff on the app, too political! Wish Obama was back in office. My fellow Gen Z’ers, keep being the change this nation needs!
attributes.title: Ugh!

attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I have ever had! It’s constantly crashing and taking forever to load. Definitely disappointed with this one.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: This app does not depict recent news with unbiased opinions. would not recommend. i would have like a more neutral take on more recent news stories
attributes.title: Recent News Stories

attributes.review: after i used this app my mom came into my room telling me that my parents were getting a divorse. If you download this app you will get bad luck for your whole life. You will also get constipated.😤😤😤
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of changing my mind about Donald. I met him a few times and he smelt very bad. Almost like stale Cheetos with mold. This app did not do anything of the sorts and I am extremely disappointed.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: i downloaded this app cause ppl were talking about it, i was so excited!!! as soon as i started getting texts, i realized that this app was FAKE NEWS😡😡on top of that, i began throwing up violently. wish i culd rate it a 0.
attributes.title: truly disappointing
